On 4/4/14, 1:27 AM, Ferencz Marton wrote:
>
>
> Hello,
>
> Does anybody know a way to automatically tear down a job when itï¿½s finished?

See:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.x+API+Guide#Heritrix3.xAPIGuide-TerminateJob

> Is there  a way to find out if a job is finished through command line?

Try a GET on the same job URI, but without one of the actions. If I 
recall correctly, that will return status info equivalent to the web 
page, in JSON or XML as desired based on your 'Accept' header.

(The docs seem to have just overlooked explicitly mentioning this 
action-free status-check.)

- Gordon
